casebody.data:
No. 10-437. Goody’s Family Clothing, Inc., et al., Petitioners v. Mountaineer Property Co. II, LLC, et al. 562 U.S. 1064, 131 S. Ct. 662,

178 L. Ed. 2d 483,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 9236. November 29, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.

Same case below, 610 F.3d 812.
